task.title: Manage keyspaces
task.shortdesc: To use a key reference in your DITA topic, you need to load the container keyspaces in FrameMaker authoring environment.

step.cmd: [ENDUSER]Open the DITA keyspace Manager Dialog (Structure > DITA > Manage Keyspaces).
[ADMIN]From the Keyspace drop-down list, select a DITA map that is defined as a keyspace. For details, see Create a keyspace.
